languages.text: {n}Паскаль указывает на переборку корабля.{/n} "Вот мой бог. Я вижу его каждый день. В каждом механизме, в каждом духе машины. Омниссия всегда со мной, он внутри меня. Но... в его сигналах нам действительно есть противоречия. Или же их трактовка, принятая нами, несла в себе дефект".

{n}Pasqal points to a bulkhead of the ship.{/n} "This is my God. A god I see every day. In every mechanism. In every machine spirit. The Omnissiah is always with me, for He is within me. And yet... His signals to us do contain contradictions. Or else we have accepted a faulty interpretation of them."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль указывает на переборку корабля.{/n} "Вот мой бог. Я вижу его каждый день. В каждом механизме, в каждом духе машины. Омниссия всегда со мной, он внутри меня. Но... в его сигналах нам действительно есть противоречия. Или же их трактовка, принятая нами, несла в себе дефект".

The Omnissiah is always with me, for He is within me. And yet... His signals to us do contain contradictions. Or else we have accepted a faulty interpretation of them."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡指着船体。{/n}“这就是我的神，我每天都会看到这位神明。祂存在于每台机械、每个机魂之中。欧姆尼塞亚始终与我同在，因为他就在我心里。然而……祂给我们的启示确实存在矛盾之处。或者说，是我们错误地理解了祂的启示。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal points to a bulkhead of the ship.{/n} "This is my God. A god I see every day. In every mechanism. In every machine spirit. The Omnissiah is always with me, for He is within me. And yet... His signals to us do contain contradictions. Or else we have accepted a faulty interpretation of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡指着船体。{/n}“这就是我的神，我每天都会看到这位神明。祂存在于每台机械、每个机魂之中。欧姆尼塞亚始终与我同在，因为他就在我心里。然而……祂给我们的启示确实存在矛盾之处。或者说，是我们错误地理解了祂的启示。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal señala a una mampara de la nave.{/n} «Este es mi dios. Un dios al que veo cada día en cada mecanismo y en cada espíritu máquina. El Omnissiah siempre me acompaña, pues está dentro de mí. Y sin embargo... sus señales contienen contradicciones. O tal vez recibimos interpretaciones defectuosas».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal points to a bulkhead of the ship.{/n} "This is my God. A god I see every day. In every mechanism. In every machine spirit. The Omnissiah is always with me, for He is within me. And yet... His signals to us do contain contradictions. Or else we have accepted a faulty interpretation of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal señala a una mampara de la nave.{/n} «Este es mi dios. Un dios al que veo cada día en cada mecanismo y en cada espíritu máquina. El Omnissiah siempre me acompaña, pues está dentro de mí. Y sin embargo... sus señales contienen contradicciones. O tal vez recibimos interpretaciones defectuosas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは船の隔壁を指差す。{/n}「これが私の神だ。毎日見ている神だ。あらゆる機械の中に。あらゆる機械精霊の中に。万機神は常に私と共にあり、私の内におられる。しかし…主の信号は矛盾を含んでいる。そうでなければ、誤った解釈を受け入れていることになる」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal points to a bulkhead of the ship.{/n} "This is my God. A god I see every day. In every mechanism. In every machine spirit. The Omnissiah is always with me, for He is within me. And yet... His signals to us do contain contradictions. Or else we have accepted a faulty interpretation of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは船の隔壁を指差す。{/n}「これが私の神だ。毎日見ている神だ。あらゆる機械の中に。あらゆる機械精霊の中に。万機神は常に私と共にあり、私の内におられる。しかし…主の信号は矛盾を含んでいる。そうでなければ、誤った解釈を受け入れていることになる」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal deutet auf ein Schott des Schiffs.{/n} "Das ist mein Gott. Ein Gott, den ich jeden Tag sehe. In jedem Mechanismus. In jedem Maschinengeist. Der Omnissiah ist immer bei mir, denn er ist in mir. Und doch ... Und doch enthalten seine Signale an uns Widersprüche. Oder wir haben eine fehlerhafte Interpretation dieser Signale akzeptiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal points to a bulkhead of the ship.{/n} "This is my God. A god I see every day. In every mechanism. In every machine spirit. The Omnissiah is always with me, for He is within me. And yet... His signals to us do contain contradictions. Or else we have accepted a faulty interpretation of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal deutet auf ein Schott des Schiffs.{/n} "Das ist mein Gott. Ein Gott, den ich jeden Tag sehe. In jedem Mechanismus. In jedem Maschinengeist. Der Omnissiah ist immer bei mir, denn er ist in mir. Und doch ... Und doch enthalten seine Signale an uns Widersprüche. Oder wir haben eine fehlerhafte Interpretation dieser Signale akzeptiert."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal montre du doigt une cloison du vaisseau.{/n} « Voici mon Dieu. Un dieu que je vois chaque jour, dans chaque mécanisme, dans chaque esprit de la machine. L'Omnimessie est toujours avec moi, car Il est en moi. Et pourtant... les signaux qu'Il nous envoie sont parfois contradictoires, à moins que nous ayons accepté une interprétation erronée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal points to a bulkhead of the ship.{/n} "This is my God. A god I see every day. In every mechanism. In every machine spirit. The Omnissiah is always with me, for He is within me. And yet... His signals to us do contain contradictions. Or else we have accepted a faulty interpretation of them."

L'Omnimessie est toujours avec moi, car Il est en moi. Et pourtant... les signaux qu'Il nous envoie sont parfois contradictoires, à moins que nous ayons accepté une interprétation erronée. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal points to a bulkhead of the ship.{/n} "This is my God. A god I see every day. In every mechanism. In every machine spirit. The Omnissiah is always with me, for He is within me. And yet... His signals to us do contain contradictions. Or else we have accepted a faulty interpretation of them."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, geminin bölmelerinden birini işaret ediyor.{/n} "Bu benim Tanrım. Her gün her mekanizmada, her makine ruhunda gördüğüm bir tanrı. Hermesih her zaman benimle çünkü O her zaman içimde. Bize gönderdiği sinyaller, çelişkiler barındırır. Aksini kabul edersek onların yanlış bir yorumunu kabul etmiş oluruz."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal points to a bulkhead of the ship.{/n} "This is my God. A god I see every day. In every mechanism. In every machine spirit. The Omnissiah is always with me, for He is within me. And yet... His signals to us do contain contradictions. Or else we have accepted a faulty interpretation of them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal geminin bölmelerinden birini işaret ediyor.{/n} "Bu benim Tanrım. Her gün gördüğüm bir tanrı. Her mekanizmada. Her makine ruhunda. Hermesih her zaman benimle çünkü O her zaman benim içimde. Bize gönderdiği sinyaller çelişkiler barındırır. Öyle olmadığını kabul edersek, onların yanlış bir yorumunu kabul etmiş oluruz."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
